location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Government of India, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a proposal by General John Dobrée Woollcombe for a siege train at Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād], and giving the Viceroy's opinion that the likelihood of siege guns being required in Rajpootana [Rājasthān] was scarce and that should such a situation occur they could be acquired from elsewhere.
